# Simulate data for linear regression----
```{r}
set.seed(540)
n <- 100
x1 <- rnorm(n)
x2 <- rnorm(n)
y <- 5 + 2 * x1 - 1.25 * x2 + rnorm(n)

df <- data.frame(x1,x2,y)
```

```{r}
# Linear regression using lm/glm (Frequentist)----
linear_lm <- lm(y ~ x1 + x2, 
                data = df)
# linear_glm <- glm(y ~ x1 + x2,
#                   family = gaussian(), data = df)

summary(linear_lm)
```
